data.text: @BarbedBarrister They call it an emergency and approves experimental injections for kids but has no data on the emergency. Wake up sheeps of India.
@abhiimalhotra @BarbedBarrister They say: Children are vaccinated to 'protect' adults. Kids are sacrificing their lives, nobody is benefited health wise.

@BarbedBarrister When you have the 'Authority' you can talk whatever you want, you can do whatever you want. Authority should be in right safe hands and not with the corrupted, ill minded people. We need to change the whole Political Eco-System. It's in the wrong hands.
@BarbedBarrister Kya Kr Rhe Ho Koi Information Nhi Hai

@BarbedBarrister This is wowwwwww. Hats off. Data handling at is best. 

#NewIndia
@BarbedBarrister @nishtunishaa You raise an RTI to get data of why covid data is not available with government.
@BarbedBarrister If they want more info on this then @awakenindiamvmt will gladly share the details with them
@BarbedBarrister They don’t have that info or they don’t want to share that info? If not then who will have this info?
